actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on diphenyl guanidine and diortho-tolyl guanidine.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through June 30, 1987, the duty on diphenyl guanidine and di-ortho-tolyl guanidine.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on diphenyl guanidine and diortho-tolyl guanidine.
